code: export var addFeature=function addFeature(feature,destinationId){return function(dispatch){fetch("http://localhost:3000/api/v1/destinations/".concat(destinationId,"/features"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(feature)}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(destination){return dispatch({type:'ADD_FEATURE',payload:destination});});};};export default addFeature;
